name: Fluffy Smash
description:
Fluffy Smash is a free-for-all cat fighting high-paced game. Pick your cat wisely and start the war. RAWR!
Destruct your opponents! Meow!
TAKE OVER THE WORLD! MEOW! 😼



🐈 CATS 🐈
An ever growing roster of cats to pick from. We are continuously adding new cats with different unique playstyles.



🐈 GAME MODE 🐈
Chase other cats as a tagger. Force them join your sides. Take over the whole map. OR play as a coward runner and never get caught. Its up to you!
